name: 盘搜搜
introduction: 可以搜索一些网盘资源
request: https://mso.pansoso.com/zh/[$key]_[$page]@charset->UTF-8@header->Content-Type:application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=UTF-8@header->user-agent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 4.4.2; Nexus 4 Build/KOT49H) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/81.0.4044.138 Mobile Safari/537.36

search.title: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'div > h2');}
search.url: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'a@attr->href')+'@header->Content-Type:application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=UTF-8@header->user-agent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 4.4.2; Nexus 4 Build/KOT49H) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/81.0.4044.138 Mobile Safari/537.36';}

url.url: function Main(text){var data = httpRequest(jsoup(text,'#down_button_link@attr->href')+'@header->Content-Type:application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=UTF-8@header->user-agent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 4.4.2; Nexus 4 Build/KOT49H) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/81.0.4044.138 Mobile Safari/537.36');return jsoup(data,'div.file > p > a@attr->href');}
